extendedInfo.description: Welcome to The Nail Art & Beauty Tips App, a FREE app to give you ladies inspiration for your next set of sexy nails, plus tutorials on how to create your own.Over the coming weeks we will be adding lots of fashion ideas and beauty tips so please check back often to see whats new.The app has a built in notifier so as soon as new posts, fashion ideas, beauty tips and new nail art are created the app will let you know.Nail art is becoming more and more popular and only the boldest and brightest nails stand out in the crown. So get those nails looking extra special and eye catching.I hope you enjoy browsing through the different nail art ideas and beauty tips and we hope you come back to view more ideas as we are adding new designs all the time.If you would like to add your own personal nail or beauty tips for inclusion in this app please send your tips to lucys.nail.art@gmail.com as well as any feedback you may have.

reviews.title: App doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: I\'m able to open the app and see the one design on the intro screen (?), but nothing works beyond that. From the advertising for the app, I expected it to be like the photos. It might have been a 5star app if it was like that. You emphasize frequent updates and I see it\'s about a year since last update? Shame. Potential for greatness, reality of it sucks. Very happy it was free, now I\'m going to remove it & recover the space it\'s taking up. I have an HKC P771A using Android 4.0.4.(ICS).
reviews.author: Kelly L

reviews.title: Dumbest app ever!
reviews.comment: They don\'t work, they shouldn\'t be out! Unfortunately, I\'m the 1st person downloaded. I tapped on the nails I liked, it said No results. Try another query. I tried another, same thing! So don\'t waste your time on this stupid app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wasted app
reviews.comment: This app is always force closing befor i get a chance to look at anything on it what is the point in having this app available if it doesnt work please fix or i will uninstall!!!!!!
reviews.author: Kerrianne Wadey

reviews.title: Great pictures
reviews.comment: Good designs, but keeps closing unexpectly,

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: This app would be great if it didn\'t force close ALL the time. I uninstalled then installed again but that didn\'t fix it. FIX THE FORCE CLOSE PLEASE!!!!!
